newsitem.title: SPAIN: Aznar, Kohl agree EMU timetable, criteria must be kept to.
newsitem.headline: Aznar, Kohl agree EMU timetable, criteria must be kept to.

text.p: Spanish Prime Minister Jose Maria Aznar said on Thursday that he and German Chancellor Helmut Kohl were in agreement that the European single currency criteria and timetable must be kept to, a government spokesman told Reuters.
The two had a long telephone conversation on Tuesday, the spokesman quoted Aznar as saying.
